_production: true means live website, false means development mode.
_domain: The domain where this application will be hosted on. Must not have a trailing slash
_last_mod: YYYY-MM-DD of last modification made to project
_login_duration: How many seconds can a user login for before needing to sign in again
_buffer_size: The size of file reading buffer
_temp_folder: Where our temporary files will be saved
_temp_file_expire: How many seconds minimum to keep a temporary download file on the server
